name: Companies & Contacts enrichment - Explorium AgentSource
description: Find B2B companies & contacts using the Explorium API. Enrich with contact info, intent data, technographics, firmographics, live events, and more. Export as CSV.

required_credentials.name: EXPLORIUM_API_KEY
required_credentials.description: Your Explorium AgentSource API key. Get one at https://developers.explorium.ai/reference/setup/getting_your_api_key

data_privacy.data_sent: API key (header), search filters, entity IDs. Free-text call_reasoning is opt-in only.
